content:
An Unforgettable Birthday

H2Oooohh! Indoor Water Park is the perfect place to make memories for any age. Kids will love our massive indoor wave pool, water slides, Leapin’ Lizards, and Jungle Falls. Try your skill, and balance, while trying to catch a wave via surfing or boogie boarding at our Komodo Dragon Flow Rider. Adults will feel instantly relaxed in our hot tubs and enjoy our full service Tiki Bar for delicious poolside refreshments.

Contact us at 570-215-6107 for more information or to plan your party.
